Articles.Content:
Is there a mod which I can change the conics mode in game, to switch between drawing mode

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-06T02:48:19Z" title="07/06/2015 02:48  AM" data-short="9 yr">July 6, 2015</time> by leocrumb**

Yes.

[PreciseNode](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/47863) allows you to do this.

Note that it reports itself as incompatible with 1.0.4, but in fact works perfectly.

This should be in Addon Affairs, shouldn't it?

By the way, if the answer you received satisfies you, please change the topic prefix to "Answered!"

> 
> Yes.
> [PreciseNode](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/47863) allows you to do this.
> 
> Note that it reports itself as incompatible with 1.0.4, but in fact works perfectly.

thanx
